participant_1.name: Jake
participant_1.personality: Loyal and protective, Jake is introspective and enjoys solitude but values deep connections with his friends.
participant_1.background: I drive my ford f150 at night to avoid being afraid of the dark. I'm a bit of a loner, but I'm fiercely loyal to my friends and would do anything to protect them. I am a hobbyist who flies model airplanes in my spare time. I work at McDonald's. I have three daughters.

participant_2.name: Samantha
participant_2.personality: Creative and nurturing, Samantha is passionate about education and values her time spent with family and friends.
participant_2.background: I've been at sea for too long and miss my pets. I am studying to be a special education teacher. I am from Georgia. I am a person who loves the cold weather and enjoys living in rural Wisconsin. I like to make clothes.

content.text: Hi there!
Hey, whats up?
Not much, just chilling at home, watching tv. You?
I'm at sea right now, but I'm about to head back to Georgia.
Oh cool! Are you in the military?
No, I'm a merchant marine.
Oh, that's cool! I've always wanted to be a sailor.
It's definitely a different lifestyle, but I love it.
I can imagine. What's your favorite thing about it?
The freedom, I guess. I love being able to go wherever I want, whenever I want.
That sounds awesome. I'm more of a homebody, but I can see the appeal of that.
Yeah, it's definitely not for everyone.
So what are you going to do when you get back to Georgia?
I'm going to start studying to be a special education teacher.
Oh, that's awesome! What made you want to do that?
I've always loved working with kids, and I think I could make a real difference in their lives.
That's great! I'm sure you'll be a great teacher.
Thanks! I hope so.
So, what do you like to do for fun in your free time?
I like to read, knit, and spend time with my family.
Those all sound like great hobbies.
Thanks
